name: CommandAdd
description:
draw2d.command.CommandAdd

Command to add a figure with CommandStack support.

functions.name: init
functions.description: Create a add command for the given figure.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: the x-coordinate or a complete point where to place the figure

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: the y-coordinate if x is a number and not a complete point

functions.name: canExecute
functions.description: Returns [true] if the command can be execute and the execution of the command modifies the model. e.g.: a CommandMove with [startX,startX] == [endX,endY] should return false. The execution of this Command doesn't modify the model.

returns.description: return try if the command modify the model or make any relevant changes

functions.name: redo
functions.description: Redo the command after the user has undo this command

functions.name: getLabel
functions.description: Returns a label of the Command. e.g. move figure.

functions.name: cancel
functions.description: Will be called if the user cancel the operation.
